Articles.Content: I'm eyeing a contract to establish an outpost on Minmus, but I tend to use Kerbal Inventory/Attachment System and Pathfinder to actually build my bases. Would using this technique allow me to fulfill this contract, or would it be a waste of my time?

Depends. If the base needs 4000 fuel or something like that, then maybe not. Otherwise, probably yes. A Minmus base that doesn't have extreme contractual conditions is generally mildly profitable and generally useful for your future career missions.
Oh, it'd be profitable, all right. I just want to make sure that I can complete the contract by using on-site assembly of the base, rather than launching it as a single, completed vehicle.
As long as all parts are launched after contract is accepted.
Then I think I'll give it a swing and see what the contract system thinks of it.
